jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
As Gojek is expanding rapidly, we are looking for top talents to help us tackle engineering challenges that is coming with it. Currently, we are doing our best efforts to make a bigger presence in cloud platforms, scale deployments of our engineering organization, and helping other team such as network and database to be automated as well.

GoMerchant at Gojek is responsible to provide the most efficient and reliable selling experience for hundreds of thousands Gojek’s online and offline merchants. To provide such experience, the Infrastructure team are responsible for providing platforms for MicroServices to operate across our hybrid infrastructure between multiple data centers, local private clouds, Amazon Web Services (AWS), and Google Cloud Platform, with complex connectivity to multiple banks and partners.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Collaborating with other engineers to ensure microservices operate reliably
  • Managing services required for microservices to run such as Kafka, Redis, and ElasticSearch
  • Managing infrastructure as code vbc
  • Willing to relocate to Jakarta

• Having strong understanding of distributed systems and Linux-based OS
  • Having strong scripting skills with preferred language of Bash, Ruby, Python, or Go
  • Proficient using configuration management tools such as Terraform and Chef
  • Having experience using tools required to operate containers, such as Docker and Kubernetes
  • Having deep understanding on managing AWS or Google Cloud Platform and hands-on experience managing Kafka, Redis, Git, and ElasticSearch services
  • Having 2+ years experience in similar role
